content.text: Aryaman has just been appointed coach of his school's football team. He wants his team to set up his team's squad logically so that the ratio of defenders to ratio of midfielders to ratio of strikers is 5:3:2. He takes 3 defenders, 2 midfielders and 1 striker from 8th standard. His final squad consists of 30 students.

hint.text: Use the ratio to find number of players in each role.
